TopicTitle: [v1.3!] Silisko Industries Doughnut Research & Spacecraft Development

Articles.Content:
He mirrored 0.12x1 yesterday and it used up all his dropbox bandwidth, I\'m sure he\'ll repost them later, several have offered space.

Maybe not this one, since he seems to not like this pack anymore (I like the look of these more, myself)
Mirror at http://www.chiark.greenend.org.uk/~jdamery/KSP/SIDR_Parts_1.3.zip

I am planning a pack like this one. I just have to find out how to do the hitbox type thing and I will release it.

Nova, can I call it SIDR reborn???

Great pack, could be updated more often though

(there\'s no way this is dying, Nova)

A few issues, mostly nodes that are bugged but a few red textures too.

Great pack, could be updated more often though

(there\'s no way this is dying, Nova)

A few issues, mostly nodes that are bugged but a few red textures too.

See: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=4180.0

Nova, you might want to update the first post with your decision to cease work on the project and it\'s incorporation into the NovaPunch pack. I could lock the topic as well.

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky
Hmmph end of an era right here

Hmmph end of an era right here

Bit sad i must say. ;-;
I remember the day this came out. All we had back then were reskins of stock parts and wobbly rockets. Times have changed
It was an amazing pack. I don\'t feel ashamed to shed a tear or two at it passing.
But.. it didn\'t pass away.
While the pack lives on in the conglomeration of Novapunch, the thread here will soon die if we stop bumping it with our remembrances.
I could totally be a dick and lock this thread :u
wait you stopped making this pack? how come? :-\

I could totally be a dick and lock this thread :u

but we could always keep editing our posts, keeping a secret community alive

wait you stopped making this pack? how come? :-\

Because it\'s uuuuuuglyyyyyyy.

new nova is too good for old nova

Jk We love you still...for now
Then and now.

wait you stopped making this pack? how come? :-\

because he didn\'t like where the pack was going and the looks. And he thought it would be better to start a new pack, which became SE (silisko edition). During this time he also started up a bunch of ideas, which are now getting released or updated. This all began 2-3 months ago (about the time that the other great pack creator, Sunday Punch, stopped being active.

At the time there was a new \'group\' of Pack Creators coming in, and overclassing the formerly amazing part packs, including Silisko Industries, which helped with making the game diverse (and loading times longer?!?!?). The KW Challenger models were in Nova\'s eyes, largely better than his lone efforts with SIDR. Thats what triggered not only the closing of the development of this part pack, but the development of the Vanguard (X-37B), SE & Probodine industrys.

My only question is where is the new N1. JK.
This thing flies like a drunken narcoleptic chimp driving an 18 wheeler.

Silisko edition is just nova trying to make the stock parts 'feel' more realistic. While Nova, Sunday Punch, And later C7 were the 3 main addon creators, there were still have a dozen or so people who made a couple parts that were just as influential as the they were. The excelsior class addon pack literally created the cult(yes its a cult) of 'stock only' players.
I am not the most knowledgeable person on the subject.
